responsibilities: Develop and apply machine learning models to run on both cloud hosts and edge platforms.
Assist with algorithm and model integration into hardware and software components.
Assist with the collection, generation, and augmentation of data sets.
Perform verification and validation of system functionality and performance.
Work with domain subject matter experts to identify algorithm and model requirements.
Stay updated on state-of-the-art machine learning techniques and technologies.
skills: Experience with common machine learning frameworks like Tensorflow or PyTorch.
Experience developing applied Machine Learning solutions using deep learning and other machine learning models.
Strong knowledge of statistics and data visualization tools.
analysis: The job responsibilities and skills focus on developing and applying machine learning models, integrating algorithms into hardware and software, and working with data sets. The skills required include proficiency in Python, experience with machine learning frameworks like TensorFlow or PyTorch, and knowledge of statistics and data visualization. While these are relevant to machine learning in general, there is no specific mention of Generative AI (GenAI) or language models (LLMs) such as GPT or BERT. The job description emphasizes applied machine learning solutions and staying updated on machine learning techniques, but it does not explicitly indicate a focus on generative models or language processing tasks that are typical of GenAI or LLMs.
